name: Invite Me In [DEMO]
description:
Walking home alone one night, you meet an injured stranger in need of help. So you do what you’d hope anyone else would do for you in that situation… you invite him in… 

~~~

This is a horror visual novel with elements of action, thriller, and romance depending on how you play. Choices are the key to deciding how this night ends.

Note: This version of the game is ~10% of the full game. Some of the images are placeholder sketches and will be finished at a later date. This demo is very minimal to meet the jam deadline. The full release will be sometime later this year! So feel free to follow me for updates.

Current Game Features:

  • 5,000+ words
  • 1 CG sketch
  • Nameable player character (gender-neutral)
  • Different choices to discover
  • Plenty of blood, horror, and general yandere nonsense to come

Writing, sprite art, CG art, and programming - Squidcolas
(GUI will be done by another artist in the full game)

Music - audionautix.com
(Music and SFX are from free sources that have no ties to the game concept or its creation, a full list of the used sounds will be in-game)

I thank anyone for taking the time to play this early demo as I’m still learning a lot and working to finish the full game. I’d also like to thank my friends and the Yandere Jam community for helping and supporting me during the creation process. 

(And if you finish the demo, feel free to comment what color hearts you got!)

~~~

Warnings!!! This is a horror game!

This game is intended for a 17+ audience and player discretion is advised. If you are sensitive to certain materials, please read content warnings and reconsider playing.

CONTENT WARNINGYandere behavior (stalking, obsession, manipulation, harassment, and violent tendencies), self-harm, blood, violence, suggestive themes, sudden tone shifts, and other material made to induce fear

This game is meant solely for entertainment. Please play responsibly.
